00023 #include "environmentsetup.h"

00025 #include <logger.h>
00026 
00030 RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::
00031 EnvironmentSetup( Ogre::RenderWindow* renderWindow, 
00032                   const char* sceneMgrName, 
00033                   const char* cameraName){
00034 
00035   LOGI("Starting environment setup");
00036 
00037   this->mRenderWindow=renderWindow;
00038   this->sceneManagerName=sceneMgrName;
00039   this->cameraName=cameraName;
00040 
00041   LOGI("Creating SceneManeger");
00042   createSceneManager();
00043   LOGI("Creating camera");
00044   createCamera();
00045   LOGI("Creating viewport");
00046   createViewport();
00047   LOGI("Creating light");
00048   createLight();
00049   LOGI("Initialising Ogre resources");
00050   ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().initialiseAllResourceGroups();
00051 
00052   LOGI("Starting adding objects");
00053   addObjects();
00054   LOGI("Environment correctly setup");
00055 }
00056

00061 
00062 }

00069 void RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::createSceneManager(){
00070   mSceneMgr=Ogre::Root::getSingleton().
00071     createSceneManager("PagingLandScapeSceneManager", sceneManagerName); 
00072 
00073   mSceneMgr->setWorldGeometry( "paginglandscape2.cfg" );
00074 
00075 }
00076 
00080 void RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::createCamera(){
00081   mCamera=mSceneMgr->createCamera(cameraName);
00082   mCamera->setPosition(Vector3(800,200,1200));
00083   mCamera->lookAt(Vector3(0,0,0));
00084 
00085 }
00086 
00090 void RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::createViewport(){
00091   mVp = mRenderWindow->addViewport(mCamera);
00092   mVp->setBackgroundColour(ColourValue(0.58, 0.65, 0.76, 1));
00093 
00094   TextureManager::getSingleton().setDefaultNumMipmaps(5);
00095   MaterialManager::getSingleton()
00096     .setDefaultTextureFiltering(Ogre::TFO_ANISOTROPIC);
00097   
00098   MaterialManager::getSingleton().setDefaultAnisotropy(2);
00099   mCamera->setAspectRatio(Real(mVp->getActualWidth()) 
00100                           / Real(mVp->getActualHeight()));
00101 
00102 }
00103 
00109 Ogre::RenderWindow* RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::getRenderWindow(){
00110   return mRenderWindow;
00111 }

00121   return mSceneMgr;
00122 }

00131 Ogre::Camera* RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::getCamera(){
00132   return mCamera;
00133 }
00134 
00140 Ogre::Viewport* RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::getViewPort(){
00141   return mVp;
00142 }

00147 void RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::createLight(){
00148   mSceneMgr->setAmbientLight(ColourValue(1, 1, 1));
00149   mainLight = mSceneMgr->createLight("Main Light");
00150   mainLight->setPosition(0, 100, -500);
00151 }
00152 
00160 void RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::addMesh(const std::string& name, 
00161                                            const char* filename,
00162                                            ObjectPos op){
00163 
00164   // the name is not used
00165   std::string posName=op.getName();
00166 
00167   // Position
00168   double px=op.getPosX();
00169   double py=op.getPosY();
00170   double pz=op.getPosZ();
00171 
00172   // Orientation
00173   double rw=op.getRotW();
00174   double rx=op.getRotX();
00175   double ry=op.getRotY();
00176   double rz=op.getRotZ();
00177 
00178   // Mesh
00179   Entity *ent = mSceneMgr->createEntity( posName.c_str(), filename );
00180   ent->setCastShadows( true );
00181   Ogre::SceneNode* sn=mSceneMgr->getRootSceneNode()
00182     ->createChildSceneNode( Vector3( px, py, pz ) );
00183 
00184   sn->setOrientation(rw, rx, ry, rz);
00185   sn->attachObject( ent );
00186 
00187 }
00188 
00192 void RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::addObjects(){
00193   xmlObjectList xol;
00194   ObjectMeshList* meshList=xol.getMeshList();
00195 
00196   ObjectMeshList::const_iterator iter;
00197   for (iter=meshList->begin(); iter != meshList->end(); iter++){
00198     treatObjectMesh((*iter));
00199     
00200   }
00201 }
00202 
00211 void RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::treatObjectMesh(ObjectMesh* om){
00212   std::string name=om->getName();
00213   const char* meshfile=om->getMeshFile();
00214 
00215 
00216   ObjectPosList poslist= om->getPosList();
00217   ObjectPosList::const_iterator iter;
00218   for (iter=poslist.begin(); iter != poslist.end(); iter++){
00219     addMesh(name, meshfile,(*iter));
00220   }
00221 
00222 }
